struct asmjit::x86x64::SegReg
#include <x86defs.h>

X86/X64 segment register.

Public Functions

SegReg()

Create a dummy segment register.

SegReg(const SegReg & other)

Create a reference to other segment register.

SegReg(uint32_t type, uint32_t index, uint32_t size)

Create a custom segment register.

SegReg(const _NoInit &)

Create non-initialized segment register.

SegReg clone()

Clone BaseReg operand.

SegReg & setSize(uint32_t size)

Set register size.

SegReg & setCode(uint32_t code)

Set register code.

SegReg & setCode(uint32_t type, uint32_t index)

Set register type and index.

SegReg & setType(uint32_t type)

Set register type.

SegReg & setIndex(uint32_t index)

Set register index.
